description.lang: When enrolled to a Nexia smart home account, the Gold 824 is a Z-Wave Plus security-enabled device that can serve as a central hub for an entire network of home automation devices from different manufacturers and product categories, including all non-battery powered devices that will act as repeaters on your network. The Gold 824 can display local weather conditions, five-day forecasts and National Weather Service warnings and alerts.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline. A Device Reset Locally Notification is sent to associated nodes when the bridge is factory reset.
